name: Standing Light Punch
miscellaneous: Can be rapid canceled

name: Standing Heavy Punch
miscellaneous: Forces the opponent into a standing position

name: Standing Heavy Kick
miscellaneous:
Forces a juggle state when hitting a mid-air opponentProduces a crumple stun for 36 frames when the attack lands as a Punish Counter
Juggle state time is extended when attack hits a mid-air opponent as a Punish Counter

name: Crouching Light Punch
miscellaneous: Can be rapid canceled

name: Crouching Light Kick
miscellaneous: Can be rapid canceled

name: Crouching Heavy Punch
miscellaneous:
Can only be canceled on the 1st active frame if the attack hitsAfter the 2nd active frame this move deals only 700 damage
Forces the opponent into a standing position

name: Crouching Heavy Kick
miscellaneous: Knockdown time extended when attack lands as a counter or Punish Counter

name: Jumping Light Kick
miscellaneous: Has cross-up attack properties

name: Jumping Medium Punch
miscellaneous: Forces a juggle state when hitting a mid-air opponent

name: Jumping Medium Kick
miscellaneous: Has cross-up attack properties

name: Jumping Heavy Punch
miscellaneous: Forces a slam knockdown on counter or Punish Counter when hitting a mid-air opponent

name: Short Uppercut
miscellaneous: Can only be canceled on the 1st active frame if the attack hitsForces the opponent into a standing position

name: Axe Kick
miscellaneous: First attack Forces the opponent into a standing position

name: Whirlwind Kick
miscellaneous: Can only be canceled with an Overdrive Aerial Tatsumaki Senpu-kyaku

name: L Shoryuken
miscellaneous:
Invincible to mid-air attacks from frames 1 - 14Considered airborne from frames 7 - 34
Note: After the 3rd active frame this move deals only 800 damage

name: M Shoryuken
miscellaneous:
Invincible to mid-air attacks from frames 1 - 9Considered airborne from frames 8 - 44
Note: After the 3rd active frame this move deals only 800 damage

name: H Shoryuken
miscellaneous:
Invincible to mid-air attacks from frames 1 - 8.Considered airborne from frames 9 - 49.
Note: After the 2nd active frame this move deals only 800 damage.

name: OD Shoryuken
miscellaneous: Completely invincible from frames 1 - 10.Considered airborne from frames 8 - 51.

name: L Tatsumaki Senpu-kyaku
miscellaneous: Considered airborne from frames 5 - 28.

name: M Tatsumaki Senpu-kyaku
miscellaneous: Considered airborne from frames 8 - 41.Values listed for Super Art gauge increases and Parry or Drive Block induced Drive Gauge increases are per hit.

name: H Tatsumaki Senpu-kyaku
miscellaneous: Considered airborne from frames 10 - 61.Values listed for Super Art gauge increases and Parry or Drive Block induced Drive Gauge increases are per hit.

name: H High Blade Kick
miscellaneous: Juggle state time is extended when attack lands as a Punish Counter.

name: L Hashogeki
miscellaneous: Forces a juggle state when the attack lands as a counter or Punish Counter.

name: M Hashogeki
miscellaneous: Forces a juggle state when the attack lands as a counter or Punish Counter.

name: [Denjin Charge]OD Hashogeki
miscellaneous: Produces a crumple stun for 39 frames when the attack lands.

name: Denjin Charge
miscellaneous: Denjin Charge stock added on the 51st frame. Only 1 Denjin Charge stock can be held at a time.Hadoken, Hashogeki, Shinku Hadoken, and Shin Hashogeki's properties are enhanced when a Denjin Charge is held.

name: SA1 Shinku Hadoken
miscellaneous:
Completely invincible on the 1st frame.Invincible to strikes and throws from frame 2 to frame 8.
Values do not change when the attack lands as a counter or Punish Counter.
The minimum guaranteed damage is 30%.

name: [Denjin Charge]SA1 Shinku Hadoken
miscellaneous:
Completely invincible on the 1st frame.Invincible to strikes and throws from frame 2 to frame 8.
Values do not change when the attack lands as a counter or Punish Counter.
The minimum guaranteed damage is 30%.

name: SA2 Shin Hashogeki（Lv1）
miscellaneous:
Completely invincible from frame 1 to frame 13.Hold down the button to change the properties of this move.
Changes to Level 2 version if the button is held for more than 8 frames and then released.
Changes to Level 3 version if the button is held for more than 38 frames and then released.
Invincible to strikes and throws from frame 2 to frame 8.
Values do not change when the attack lands as a counter or Punish Counter.
The minimum guaranteed damage is 40%.

Changes to Level 3 version if the button is held for more than 38 frames and then released.
Invincible to strikes and throws from frame 2 to frame 8.
Values do not change when the attack lands as a counter or Punish Counter.
The minimum guaranteed damage is 40%.

name: Shoulder Throw
miscellaneous:
Properties change to the following when the attack lands as a Punish Counter:- Deals 2040 damage
- Super Art gauge increases by 4000
- Forces a hard knockdown

name: Somersault Throw
miscellaneous:
Properties change to the following when the attack lands as a Punish Counter:- Deals 2040 damage
- Super Art gauge increases by 4000
- Forces a hard knockdown

name: Backward Dash
miscellaneous: Invincible to throws from frame 1 to frame 15.

name: Drive Impact: Shingeki
miscellaneous:
Super Armor for 2 hits from frames 1 - 27Produces a wall splat if the pushback on hit causes the opponent to connect with the stage wall
Properties change to the following when the attack lands as a Punish Counter, or after the Super Armor absorbs a hit:
- Produces a crumple stun if the opponent is standing on the ground
- Forces a spinning knockdown when hitting a mid-air opponent
- Super Art gauge increases by 3000

note: (When blocking or during a successful Drive Parry)
name: Drive Reversal: Chest Strike
miscellaneous:
Recoverable damageCompletely invincible from frames 1 - 22
5 frames of recovery added on hit

name: Drive Parry
miscellaneous:
Can be canceled from the 4th frame via Drive RushParry hitbox is extended for as long as the buttons are held
Only blocks can be performed during the recovery period
Always in Punish Counter state during execution.

name: Perfect Parry (strike)
miscellaneous:
Perfect Parry activates when an attack is absorbed on the frame a parry is input, or on the next frameFully invincible for 6 frames once recovery is over (invincibility not granted if you continue the parry)
The player on the receiving end of a Perfect Parry cannot cancel and is forced into a Punish Counter state until their move is finished

name: Perfect Parry (projectile)
miscellaneous:
Perfect Parry activates when an attack is absorbed on the frame a parry is input, or on the next frameNo screen freeze occurs.
The player on the receiving end of a Perfect Parry cannot cancel and is forced into a Punish Counter state until their move is finished

name: Parry Drive Rush
miscellaneous:
Screen freeze occurs on the 10th frameCan be canceled into an attack on the 9th frame of the move
Can be canceled into actions other than a parry from the 24th frame

name: Cancel Drive Rush
miscellaneous:
Screen freeze occurs on the 9th frameCan be canceled into an attack from the 10th frame of the move
Can be canceled into actions other than a parry from the 25th frame
